education.degree: Master of Science, Applied Data Science
Bachelor of Engineering, Electronics and Computer Engineering

achievements: Designed and implemented a scalable data pipeline to collect, transform, and load tenant data from 38 Azure tenants into a centralized repository using Python, Azure Data Factory, and Power BI.

Led a team of six engineers as Scrum Master to migrate SharePoint data across multiple countries, implementing best practices for data validation, monitoring, and reporting; delivered ahead of schedule.
Developed a PowerApps-based app integrated with SQL Stored Procedures for internal data tracking across 146 office locations, reducing manual input and improving data consistency.
Created a data pipeline to automate migration of 6TB of unstructured data from on-premises SharePoint servers to Azure Blob Storage and SharePoint Online, ensuring seamless flow and scalability.
Built data ingestion and processing pipelines for Microsoft 365 activity logs, decreasing audit time by 70% by automating data validation, transformation, and loading processes.
Created and deployed scheduled jobs using Azure DevOps to consolidate application logs from 18 servers across 3 environments into a unified database for further processing.
Developed a travel request portal that reduced processing time from 10 days to 3 days and provided real-time historical data via Power BI.
Built a web app to manage dynamic email distribution lists (1,600 entries) and automated data loading into SharePoint using C# for 60,000+ users.

projects.name: Sentiment Analysis Pipeline
projects.description: Engineered a Python-based pipeline that scraped Amazon & Peloton reviews using BeautifulSoup and PySpark, ingested data into PostgreSQL, and delivered interactive insights via a Streamlit dashboard.

projects.name: FIFA Striker Market Value Predictor
projects.description: Developed a regression model leveraging player performance, physical attributes, and stats to forecast football strikers' market value, empowering smarter scouting and investment decisions.
